content: **forever free on my website** get a free crochet blanket pattern will have you dropping all your other wip s to make this throw the **chic modern mosaic blocks throw** pattern is a fun project to crochet made with two colors of worsted weight washable merino yarn this afghan can be made to match any home decor this is a free pattern on the marlybird com website an ad free pdf will soon be available the ad free pdf includes crochet chart
